body_html:
Are there any disadvantages in converting input_tensor from tfrecords into a generator this way:

def` tensors2gen(*input_tensors):
    while True:
        data = sess.run(input_tensors)
        if len(input_tensors) == 1:
            data = data[0]
        yield data

and then train a model using fit_generator that also supports validation data parameter?
